formDescription: Use this form to provide your correct Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) to requesters who are required to file information returns with the IRS.
formTitle: Request for Taxpayer Identification Number and Certification

sections.description: Enter your name, business name (if applicable), and tax classification.

fields.label: Name of entity/individual
fields.name: name
fields.tooltip: Enter the name of the entity or individual. For sole proprietors, enter the owner's name.

fields.label: Business name/disregarded entity name
fields.name: businessName
fields.tooltip: Enter the business name if different from the owner's name.

fields.label: Tax classification
fields.name: taxClassification
fields.tooltip: Select the appropriate tax classification for the entity/individual.

fields.label: Foreign partner, owner, or beneficiary confirmation
fields.name: partnershipInterest
fields.tooltip: Check this box if you have any foreign partners, owners, or beneficiaries and you are providing this form to a partnership, trust, or estate in which you have an ownership interest.

fields.label: Exemptions
fields.name: exemptions
fields.tooltip: Enter any applicable exemption codes. See instructions for details.

fields.label: Requester's name and address (optional)
fields.name: requesterNameAndAddress
fields.tooltip: Enter the requester's name and address.

fields.label: Address
fields.name: address
fields.tooltip: Enter the address (number, street, and apt. or suite no.).

fields.label: City, state, and ZIP code
fields.name: cityStateZip
fields.tooltip: Enter the city, state, and ZIP code.

sections.title: General Information

fields.errorMessage: Please enter a valid SSN in the format XXX-XX-XXXX
fields.label: Social security number
fields.name: socialSecurityNumber
fields.tooltip: Enter your Social Security Number (SSN) if you are an individual.

fields.errorMessage: Please enter a valid EIN in the format XX-XXXXXXX
fields.label: Employer identification number
fields.name: employerIdentificationNumber
fields.tooltip: Enter your Employer Identification Number (EIN) if you are a business entity.

sections.description: Certify that the information provided is correct.

fields.label: Certification statement 1
fields.name: certification1
fields.value: The number shown on this form is my correct taxpayer identification number (or I am waiting for a number to be issued to me); and

fields.label: Certification statement 2
fields.name: certification2
fields.value: I am not subject to backup withholding because (a) I am exempt from backup withholding, or (b) I have not been notified by the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) that I am subject to backup withholding as a result of a failure to report all interest or dividends, or (c) the IRS has notified me that I am no longer subject to backup withholding; and

fields.label: Certification statement 3
fields.name: certification3
fields.value: I am a U.S. citizen or other U.S. person (defined below); and

fields.label: Certification statement 4
fields.name: certification4
fields.value: The FATCA code(s) entered on this form (if any) indicating that I am exempt from FATCA reporting is correct.

sections.title: Certification
